dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1970
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Sketchy account of her around-the-world trip and two obituaries of lon-time Catholic Workers, "Smokey Joe" Motyka and Peggy Baird.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 504 1970-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
